description: This file is a React component written in TypeScript, setting up the main layout and routing for a Remix.run application. It imports necessary components from @remix-run/react and @remix-run/node, defines the document structure with meta tags, links to external stylesheets, and handles rendering child components within the layout.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Provides external link tags for preconnecting to font sources and linking to Google Fonts stylesheet.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Defines the main HTML structure for the application, including head tags and body content, wrapping children components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component that renders the current route's outlet.
